loans.name: Parveen

texts.en:
Ms. Parveen is 47 years old – a vigorous, married woman. She is the mother of five children. She has had a business doing hand embroidery for the past five years. She is passionate about her work and client demand is strong. Parveen’s embroidery patterns are very popular on her street and she is the best earning resource in her household. But business challenges, combined with family expenditures, frustrate her nearly every day. In order to meet the requirements of her customers, she needs to purchase more spools of thread, packs of sequins, pearls and glittering material. For this, she requested a loan of 20,000 Pakistani rupees from Kashf Foundation.

Ms. Parveen has a dream of running a training center for girls of her village. She would teach them embroidery skills, so they can help her expand her business and also earn money for themselves. She is also interested in opening her own shop in the market to display her work.

loans.use: to purchase more spools of threads, packs of sequins, pearls and glittering material

loans.name: Zohra

texts.en:
Zohra, age 37, has been running a hand embroidery business for many years. She is vigorous and passionate about her work, and client demand is strong. Although business challenges, combined with family expenditures, frustrate her nearly every day, Zohra’s embroidery patterns are very popular on her street and she is the best-earning resource in her household. She is the mother of four children. 

Zohra wants to grow her business, so she has requested a loan in the amount of Rs 25000 in order to buy raw materials such as thread, sequins, and pearls in larger quantities so that she can meet with the increasing demand of her customers. 

She wishes to spend the better part of her profits on the improvement of her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as thread, sequins, and pearls for her hand-embroidery business

loans.name: Zareena

texts.en:
Zareena, age 42, sells milk to earn an income. She and her husband have six children, and she initiated her own business 20 years ago by buying a buffalo to help support her family at a time when her husband was the only breadwinner. With the passage of time, her sales and her income increased. Now she has two buffaloes and one cow. This has all happened as a result of her courage and determination. Because of her work, she is respected in her home, and she helps her husband in all family matters as well as financial matters. While talking to the Kashf officer, she shared the feeling of achievement she felt as a result of being able to send her son to college for further studies.

Zareena is in her eighth loan cycle with Kashf Foundation. She wants to buy another buffalo, which she intends to do with money she has already saved in addition to her requested loan funds. For this purpose, she has applied for a loan in the amount of PKR 30,000. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 

She is very thankful to Kashf for its support.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo

loans.name: Zarka

texts.en: Ms. Zarka is a 42-year-old married woman. Three years ago, she started her own business of clothing sales when her husband got severely ill. She didn’t lose hope and contacted Kashf Foundation upon the advice of her neighbor to initiate her own business. She buys clothes of different designs from the market, in bulk, at lower rates and sells them in her community. She counts a good client list, most of her clients are her neighbors. She is a mother of three children, two of them are school-going. Zarka wishes to send the other child to school, but is unable to cover the expenses. She has gradually improved her business. Now she requested a loan of 40,000 PKR. She is going to use this loan to buy an ample variety of clothes in a larger quantity to add to her current ones. She intends to use the earned profits on her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy an ample variety of clothes in a larger quantity to add to her current ones.

loans.name: Allah-Rakhi

texts.en: Ms. Allah-Rakhi had a difficult time after her husband's business failure. She decided to work with her husband to support her family for a better future. Two years ago she began stitching work in her house. She stitches for the people living around her house and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to lack of availability of funds, she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. She is married and provides for one child. She is currently in her first loan cycle and has borrowed 20,000 PKR from Kashf. She intends to use this loan amount to buy raw materials including cloth, threads of different colors, laces, zips, etc. to create a means of increasing revenues so she may be able to generate a healthier source of income.

loans.use: to buy raw materials including cloth, threads of different colors, laces, zips, etc.

loans.name: Sina Group

texts.en:
This group is called Sina which consists of four ladies who live in Hodeidah, Yemen. They are helpful ladies who assist each other.  They have different types of businesses.
Sina is a 37-year-old married woman with many children.  They live in Hodeidah.  They live in difficult conditions. Sina assists her husband in providing a good life for their children.  She has been selling incense and perfumes for many years.  She is forced to work due to the family’s daily expenses. She would like to improve her business but she suffers from lack of capital. She applied for a loan of 20,000 YER from AMB to buy more incense and perfumes to resell.  She hopes with this loan to increase her profits.

loans.use: to buy more incense and perfumes.

loans.name: Sila Group

texts.en:
This group is called Sila and consists of five ladies who live in Sana'a, Yemen. Together, they have requested a loan in the amount of 115,000 YER from AMB. 

Amira, a member of the group, is a hard-working woman who has for a long time been the sole supporter of her six children. She sells used clothing to earn an income. She has operated her business for many years and has gained the respect and admiration of her neighbors and clients. She tells us that she works instead of sleeping if her children ever have less than what they need. Amira tells us that her business is not running as well as it has in the past, due to the bad situation in Yemen. 

Amira has applied for a loan in the amount of 20,000 YER from AMB in order to buy additional clothes to continue her business. She hopes to expand her business in order to improve her family's living standards.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothing to offer for sale

loans.name: Carlos Alfredo

texts.es:
Carlos es un joven de 19 años de edad, que lucha por salir adelante y tener la oportunidad de estudiar. Su familia es de escasos recursos, razón por la cual no cuentan con el dinero para ofrecerle a su hijo educación. 
A pesar de la difícil situación que afrontan en su hogar, Carlos no ha perdido la esperanza de alcanzar su sueño, motivo por el cual desea dedicarse a la venta ambulante de helados con el fin de reunir el dinero necesario para ingresar a la universidad. Para iniciar con su idea de negocio se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de helado y una nevera de icopor para el almacenamiento de sus productos.

Con este proyecto, espera poder lograr su sueño y convertirse en un gran empresario, mejorando su situación económica y colaborarle a su familia con los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Carlos is a 19-year-old young many who fights to get ahead and have the opportunity to get an education.  His family has few means, which is why they do not have the money to provide their son with and education.

Despite the difficulties he faces at home, Carlos has not lost hope of achieving his dream.  This is why he wants to sell ice cream on foot so he can save up the money he needs to attend a university.  To get his business idea started, he is asking for a loan he will use to buy ice cream and a polystyrene cooler to store his products.

He hopes to achieve his dream with this project and become a great businessman, improving his finances and contributing to his family's household expenses.

loans.use: to buy ice cream and a polystyrene cooler

loans.name: Ligia

texts.es:
Ligia de 63 años de edad, ha dedicado toda su vida a laborar en trabajos varios para ofrecerle a sus dos hijos, mejores condiciones de vida. Hace 5 años, tras sufrir un accidente que la dejó en cama por más de 6 meses, se enfrentó a una difícil situación económica debido a que su actividad era la única fuente de ingresos. Su yerno le facilitó un dinero con el cual ella decidió montar en su casa una pequeña miscelánea con el fin de generar su sustento. 

Con su negocio ella ha podido mejorar su condición de vida, pero desea que su empresa crezca y poder convertirla en una fuente de empleo para otras personas, motivada por este sentir y teniendo en cuenta que la temporada escolar comienza, doña Ligia se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de papelería y cacharros; con el propósito de mejorar sus ventas y ofrecer un mejor servicio.
texts.en: Ligia is 63 years old and she has dedicated her entire life to working various jobs so that she could give her two children better living conditions. 5 years ago, after suffering an accident that left her in bed for more than 6 months, she faced a difficult economic situation due to the fact that her work was her only source of income. Her son-in-law lent her money with which she decided to open a small general store in her house in order to make a living. With her business she has been able to improve her quality of life, but she would like her business to grow and to be able to convert it into a source of employment for other people. Motivated by that feeling and keeping in mind that the academic year is starting, Ligia is requesting a loan so that she can buy stationery and kitchenware with the goal of improving her sales and offering better service.

loans.use: to buy stationery and kitchenware

loans.name: Luz Mery

texts.es:
Luz Mery, es una mujer que se ha esforzado por salir adelante y brindarle a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida, desde hace 22 años, montó su legumbrería en el parque del municipio de Cañas Gordas, Colombia, y posteriormente tuvo la oportunidad de radicarlo en la plaza de mercado en donde labora de lunes a domingo de 8 a 6 de la tarde. Su mayor sueño es poder ampliar la capacidad de venta de su negocio por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de frutas y verduras. 
Su gran reto ha sido poder mantener su negocio en el tiempo debido a que existe mucha competencia, por lo cual en ocasiones le toca vender sus productos más baratos con el fin de que no se dañen.
Luz Mery espera poder tener la oportunidad de generar empleo a otra persona con el fin de descansar un día a la semana, pero para ello necesita incrementar su nivel de ventas.
texts.en: Luz Mery is a woman who has pushed herself to get ahead and to give her children a better quality of life. 22 years ago she opened a fruit and vegetable stand in the park of the municipality of Cañas Gordas, Colombia and subsequently she had the opportunity to establish it in the market plaza where she works Monday to Sunday from 8 in the morning to 6 in the afternoon. Her biggest dream is to be able to expand the selling capacity of her business which is why she is requesting a loan for the purchase of fruits and vegetables. Her biggest challenge has been to be able to maintain her business during the season due to the fact that a lot of competition exists, which is why at times she has had to sell her products for less so that they don't spoil. Luz Mery hopes to be able to have the opportunity to be able to employ another person so that she may be able to rest one day of the week, but for that she will need to increase her level of sales.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables

loans.name: María De Las Mercedes

texts.es: María de 58 años de edad, es viuda y madre de cuatro hijos. Una de sus mayores pasiones es el trabajo, por lo cual disfruta laborar como independiente y ser una gran comerciante. Hace 15 años en el municipio de Cañas Gordas la administración  municipal creo una plaza de mercado, dando la oportunidad a varias familias para montar su negocio. María no lo pensó dos veces y aprovechó la oportunidad para crear su empresa. Con esta actividad ella ha podido ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y llevar los gastos de su hogar después del fallecimiento de su esposo. Su mayor sueño es poder incrementar sus ventas para acceder a una vivienda digna, por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito que destinará a la compra de frutas y verduras.
texts.en:
María, 58, is a widow and mother of four children. One of her greatest passions is her work. She enjoys working as a successful independent vendor. 

Fifteen years ago, in the Cañas Gordas municipality, the municipal administration created a marketplace giving several families the opportunity to set up businesses. 

Maria didn't think twice about it and took advantage of the opportunity to create a business. Through this she has been able to offer her family a better quality of life and take care of household expenses after her husband passed away. 

Her biggest dream is to increase sales so she improve her living situation. For this reason she is requesting a loan to buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Fabiola De Jesús

texts.es: María de 58 años de edad, es viuda y madre de cuatro hijos. Una de sus mayores pasiones es el trabajo, por lo cual disfruta laborar como independiente y ser una gran comerciante. Hace 15 años en el municipio de Cañas Gordas la administración  municipal creo una plaza de mercado, dando la oportunidad a varias familias para montar su negocio. María no lo pensó dos veces y aprovechó la oportunidad para crear su empresa. Con esta actividad ella ha podido ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y llevar los gastos de su hogar después del fallecimiento de su esposo. Su mayor sueño es poder incrementar sus ventas para acceder a una vivienda digna, por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito que destinará a la compra de frutas y verduras.
texts.en: María is 58 years old. She is a widow and the mother of four children. One of her greatest passions is working, through which she enjoys laboring independently and being a good sales person. She has spent 15 years in the city of Cañas Gordas. The local government created a marketplace  that gave various families the opportunity to start their businesses. María didn't think twice and took advantage of the the opportunity to create her business. Through this activity she has been able to offer her family a better quality of life and to cover the expenses of her home after her husband passed away. Her greatest dream is to be able to increase her earnings to gain access to a decent dwelling. For this reason she is seeking a loan that is intended for the purchase of fruits and vegetables.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Samuel Enrique

texts.es:
“La vida es un rompecabezas y las fichas se unen en el momento indicado”, con esta frese Samuel de 44 años de edad, cuenta como se formó como barbero. 
En búsqueda de mejores oportunidades de estudio Samuel, aún siendo un joven migró para la ciudad con la intención de terminar su bachiller. Se radicó en la casa de su tía, la cual era peluquera y ella le enseñó el oficio. Posteriormente ingresó a prestar el servicio militar y allí se convirtió en el barbero de su cuadrilla. De este modo, adquirió la técnica y la perfeccionó ingresando a un instituto para certificarse. 
Con esta trayectoria Samuel decidió radicarse en el municipio de Andes, Colombia, en donde montó su barbería, la cual atiende diariamente de 8 de la mañana a 8 de la noche. En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de un lava-cabezas y un tocador, para la prestación de un mejor servicio.
texts.en:
"Life is a puzzle and the pieces come together at the right time": with this phrase,  Samuel, 44 years old, tells how he became a barber.

In search of better educational opportunities, Samuel, still being young, moved to the city with the intention of completing his secondary education. 
He lived at his aunt's house who was a hairdresser and who taught him the trade. Afterwards, he entered military service, and there he became the barber of his squad. In this way, he acquired the technique and perfected it by entering an institute to earn his certification. 

With this career path, Samuel decided to settle in the municipality of Andes, Colombia where he set up his barbershop which, operates daily from 8 A.M. until 8 P.M. Presently, he is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of a shampoo sink and a dressing table in order to provide better service.

loans.use: to buy a shampoo sink and a dressing table.

loans.name: Vibula Mbagara Group

texts.en:
Seleman, who is in his mid 40s, is married and has nine children, of whom two are in school and the remaining are grown. He has been running a business selling sodas, waters, juices, biscuits and sweets for six years now. He works from 7 a.m. to 10 p.m. daily and he is able to make a very small profit per month.

This will be his fifth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to repair the business premise, pay the electricity bill, and buy a table, TV, fridge and two chairs for the business. He has paid back all his loans successfully. 

He wants a loan to pay for a digital system for his business TV and to repair his fridge. His dream is to one day be able to buy a weighing machine so as to sell products like sugar.

He will share this loan with his loan group, "Vibula," which has 12 members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to pay for a digital system for his business TV and to repair his fridge.

loans.name: Gilberto

texts.es:
Gilberto de 58 años de edad ha logrado salir adelante con esfuerzo y dedicación, cuenta que antes de montar su negocio laboró en un restaurante en donde aprendió sobre la administración y el servicio al cliente, razón por la cual decidió independizarse e invertir sus ahorros en la creación de su propio negocio. Hoy lleva 7 años en su restaurante-cafetería y se siente satisfecho con sus metas alcanzadas, asegura que esta actividad le ha permitido ofrecerles a su esposa y a sus seis hijos una mejor calidad de vida y una buena educación.
Su mayor anhelo es poder expandir su negocio y generar fuentes de empleo con el fin de beneficiar a otras familias. En búsqueda de su objetivo, Gilberto se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de surtido como mecatos, gaseosas y materia prima para la elaboración de comida.
texts.en:
Gilberto is 58 years old. He has made progress with effort and dedication. Before he set up his business, he worked in a restaurant where he learned management and customer service. This is the reason why he decided to become independent and invest his savings in the creation of his own business. Today his restaurant-cafeteria is seven years old and he feel satisfied with his achieved goals. The business allows him to offer his wife and six children a better quality of life and a good education.
His biggest wish is to be able to expand his business and to generate sources of employment in order to help other families. In pursuit of his goal, Gilberto is requesting a loan in order to purchase a variety of pastries, soft drinks and supplies for making food.

loans.use: purchase a variety of pastries, soft drinks and supplies for making food

loans.name: Gloria Elena

texts.es:
Gloria Elena de 43 años de edad, es madre soltera de 3 hijos. Toda su vida ha tenido que velar por el bienestar y la educación de ellos. Es una mujer fuerte que no se deja derrotar por las situaciones difíciles que ha tenido que atravesar para sacar adelante su familia. Desde hace dos años decidió convertirse en una microempresaria aprovechando sus habilidades para la costura; confecciona y elabora camas, correas y accesorios para caninos. Su pequeño taller lo ubicó en un espacio de su casa en donde trabaja diariamente de siete de la mañana a cinco de la tarde. Sus productos los  ofrece en las tiendas de mascotas del municipio de Itagüí. 
Su mayor anhelo es poder garantizarles a sus hijos la oportunidad de acceder a la educación superior y convertirse en grandes profesionales. Así mismo busca que su empresa se consolide y pueda generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su casa. Por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de una fileteadora y recubridora con el fin de aumentar su producción y ventas.
texts.en:
Gloria Elena is a 43 year old, single mother with three children.  All her life, she has had to look after her children’s welfare and education.  She is a strong woman who has not let herself be defeated by difficult situations she has had to go through to get her family ahead.  Two years ago, taking advantage of her sewing skills, she decided to become a micro-entrepreneur.  She designs and makes beds, leashes, and accessories for dogs.  Her small workshop is located in an area of her home where she works daily from seven in the morning until five in the evening.  She sells her products in pet shops in the town of Itagüí.

Her greatest desire is to be able to assure her children the opportunity to access higher education and become successful professionals.  She also seeks to strengthen her business and generate the income she needs to sustain her home.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan to purchase an overlock sewing machine and coverstich sewing machine in order to increase production and sales.  
.

loans.use: to purchase an overlock and a coverstich sewing amcine.

loans.name: Luisa Fernanda

texts.es:
Luisa Fernanda es una guerrera a la que la vida le ha enseñado grandes lecciones. Siendo apenas una adolescente quedó embarazada y el padre de su hijo la abandonó sin responsabilizarse de su deber. Su familia es de escasos recursos por lo cual no tenían la capacidad para sostenerla y tuvo que tomar la decisión de buscar empleo para sobrevivir y ofrecerle a su hijo alimentación. Por su falta de educación el mundo laboral le cerró las puertas, pero a pesar de las circunstancias nunca desistió y se dedicó a la venta de dulces en los buses de transporte público. Desde hace 6 años inició con la venta de mecatos, café  y cigarrillos de manera ambulante en las calles del centro de Medellín.

Su mayor deseo es poder laborar arduamente para conseguir el dinero necesario para tener una casa digna y darles a sus hijos una buena educación. Para ello espera mejorar las ventas de su negocio por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos.
texts.en: Luisa Fernanda is a fighter who learned a lot from life. When she was only a teenager, she got pregnant and the child's father abandoned her rather callously. Her family being very poor, they were unable to support her, which is why she had to find work in order to feed her son. She had trouble finding work because of her insufficient education, but, in spite of this, she never gave up, choosing instead to start by selling sweets on public transport. Six years ago, she started selling sweets, coffee, and cigarettes in the streets of Medellín's city centre. Her greatest wish is to be able to keep working hard in order to earn enough money to keep a decent house and giver her children a good education. She is thus asking for a loan in order to improve her sales by buying more products to sell.

loans.use: to buy sweets, coffee, and cigarettes to sell.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
Maribel de 39 años de edad, ha sabido como ganarse la vida y generar ingresos para colaborarle a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. Tras una difícil situación económica que afrontaron hace algún tiempo cuando su cónyuge se quedó desempleado, Maribel se vio en la necesidad de asumir las responsabilidades de su familia por lo cual se dedicó a la venta de ropa sobre pedidos. Actividad que le ha permitido mejorar las condiciones de vida en su casa y de paso crear su propia empresa. Esta mujer agradece a Dios por la dificultad que atravesaron, porque asegura que gracias a ésta, sus vidas han mejorado considerablemente y los unió mucho más como familia.

En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el fin de comprar mercancía (ropa estudiantil)  para la temporada escolar, aprovechando la ocasión para generar mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
Maribel, 39, has known how to make a living and generate income to collaborate with her husband on the home expenses. After a difficult economic situation that they faced a while ago when her husband was left unemployed, Maribel saw that it was necessary to assume responsibility for the family.  So, she began  selling clothing through orders.  This business has allowed her to improve the quality of life in her home and also create her own company.  This woman thanks God for the challenge they faced, because she is sure that thanks to this their lives have improved considerably and they are much more united as a family.

Currently she is requesting a loan to buy merchandise (materials for student uniforms) for the school season, taking advantage of the occasion to generate more income.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Yerna María

texts.es:
Yerna de 57 años de edad, considera que su mayor prioridad como madre es velar por el cuidado y bienestar de sus hijos, llevada por su sentir, decidió estudiar confección y crear su propia empresa que le permitiera generar ingresos para sostener su hogar y que le brindara el tiempo para compartir con su familia. Hace 30 años labora en el sector de la confección y siente que su trabajo ha sido una de sus más grandes alegrías porque le permitió cumplir grandes proyectos que se trazó en la vida. 
Hoy se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el fin comprar tela para confeccionar uniformes para la temporada escolar, con el fin de aprovechar la demanda.
Su mayor deseo es poder expandir su negocio y ofrecerles a las mujeres cabeza de familia la oportunidad de laborar para contribuir con el mejoramiento de la calidad de vida de cada una de ellas.
texts.en:
Yerna, 57, considers taking care of her children to be her main priority as a mother. Because of this she decided to study dressmaking and start her own business. This allowed her to generate income to sustain her home and give her time to be with her family. 

She has been working in the garment industry for thirty years and feels that her work has been one of her greatest joys. It has allowed her to fullfil large projects throughout her life. 

Today she is asking for a loan to buy fabric to sew school uniforms and take advantage of the current demand. 

Her greatest wish is to be able to expand her business and to give women, who are heads of households, the chance to work so they can contribute towards the improvement of their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fabric to sew school uniforms

loans.name: Dúo Bendición De Sacsuy Group

texts.es:
DUO BENDICION DE SACSUY
Este dúo lo forma la señora María Emilia quien tiene 46 años de edad, es casada, y tiene 4 hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa típica desde hace 2 años, solicita este crédito para comprar ropa típica ya que empieza la época escolar y ella vende blusas de color de uniformes, también cortes y trata la manera de comprar suéteres y vendérselos a un buen precio a las personas, el capital que ella tiene lo tiene invertido porque en la temporada navideña ella invirtió bastante, espera que fape pueda brindarle el apoyo para comprar lo que necesita y así obtener ganancias y seguir con su negocio.esta solicitando este credito para la compra de ropa tipica para la venta.
texts.en:
BENDICION DE SACSUY DUO

María Emilia, 46, is part of this duo.  She’s married and has four children.  She has been working selling traditional clothing for two years.  She requested this loan to buy traditional clothes because the school term is starting and she sells blouses in school uniform colors as well as fabric and tries to buy sweaters to sell to people at good prices.  She has her capital well-invested because she used it during the Christmas season to invest quite a bit.  She hopes that FAPE will be able to give her support to buy what she needs to earn profits and continue in business.  She’s requesting this loan to buy traditional clothing to sell.

loans.use: to buy traditional clothing to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy 3 calves and supplies to maintain them.

loans.name: Darwin Enrique

texts.es: El señor Darwin, Habita en el municipio de Masaya, junto a su esposa y sus hijo, el trabaja para una empresa privada y su esposa es comerciante, entre los dos se dividen los gastos del hogar, su mayor sueño es tener su casita propia y bien acondicionada, pero la dificultad que se les presenta es que no pueden recaudar de una sola vez el dinero para comprar los materiales para construir, gracias a este financiamiento que Afodenic atravez de Fondos Kiva le estan otorgando comprara lo necesario como: Bloques, Arena, Cemento, Hierro para realizar las mejorar que requiere su casa.
texts.en: Darwin lives in the city of Masaya with his wife and their son. He works for a private company, and his wife is a shopkeeper. They split living expenses between the two of them. Darwin’s dream is to have their own well-equipped house, but they are finding it difficult to raise the money needed to buy construction materials all at once. Thanks to financing granted by Afodenic through KIVA, Darwin will buy what he needs to make progress on his house:  blocks, sand, cement, and iron.

loans.use: buy construction materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy a computer and textbooks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to repair her home

loans.name: Union Progreso Group

texts.es: Cordiales saludos: El grupo “Unión Progreso” está conformado por 12 socios entusiastas que pasan a su 8 ciclo, en el transcurso del tiempo dicho grupo han demostrado responsabilidad. Este es el caso de María Felicita una de las integrantes, casada con 05 hijos, la cual sigue apoyando a 01 de ellos. María Felicita se dedica a la venta de útiles de escolares, pues cuenta con una librería en su vivienda. Este negocio es fruto de su esfuerzo que con mucho trabajo ha ido mejorando cada día. Su último crédito lo destino para la compra de útiles escolares como cuadernos, lapiceros, fólderes y plumones. Seguir implementado su negocio es su mayor deseo. María Felicita es la tercera del lado izquierdo viste chaleco negro y pantalón azul. El grupo “Unión Progreso” agradece el crédito brindado, ya que hace posible su progreso.
texts.en: Cordial greetings! The group "Unión Progreso" (Progress Union) consists of 12 enthusiastic members who are in their 8th loan cycle. In the course of time, this group has demonstrated responsibility. This is the case with Maria Felicita, one of the members. She is married and has 5 children, of whom she continues to support one. Maria Felicita sells school supplies, since she has a bookstore in her home. This business is the result of her effort, and, with much work, it has been improving more every day. She used her last loan to buy school supplies such as notebooks, pencils, folders, and markers. To continue setting up her business is her greatest desire. Maria Felicita is the third from the left side. She is wearing a black jacket and blue pants. The group Unión Progreso appreciates the loan offered, since it makes their progress possible.

loans.use: to buy school supplies to sell.

loans.name: Mujeres Forjadoras Group

texts.es:
¡Saludos desde Perú! Este es el grupo Mujeres Forjadoras

Fátima uno de sus miembros es casada y tiene 02 hijos. Fátima tiene el apoyo de su esposo quien trabaja brindando servicio de transporte público como taxista, ella por su parte  tiene una bodega en su casa; empezó su negocio hace 04 años  con el fin de ayudar a su esposo con los gastos familiares. Fátima trabaja en su bodega todos los días aproximadamente 16 horas. Los clientes que atiende son en su mayoría sus vecinos y  residentes del lugar quienes acuden a su negocio en busca de diversos productos. Gracias a su trabajo ha podido terminar la construcción de su casa y apoyar a sus hijos con los estudios. Con el préstamo solicitado podrá comprar más productos para incrementar su bodega, en el futuro desea ampliar su negocio para atender  más clientes. 
Fatima es la primera de la fila, viste polo color turqueza.
¡Fatima le agradece su apoyo!
texts.en:
Greetings from Peru! This is the Women Builders group.

Fátima, one of the members, is married and has two children.  Fátima has the support of her husband who works providing public transportation services as a taxi driver. She, for her part, has a grocery store in her home. She began her business four years ago with the goal of helping her husband with the family expenses. Fátima works in her store every day for approximately 16 hours. The customers that she attends to are mainly her neighbors and residents of the area who go to her business in search of diverse products. Thanks to her work she has been able to complete the construction of her home and to support her children with their studies. With the loan she is seeking she will be able to buy more products to expand her store. In the future she wants to enlarge her business to attend to more customers. 

Fátima is the first woman in the line, dressed in a turquoise shirt. 

Fátima  is thankful for your support!

loans.use: to buy products for her grocery store.

loans.name: El Arbolito Group

texts.es:
La Sra. Mavila es miembro del  grupo El Arbolito

La Sra. Mavila tiene 52 años. Ella es viuda y tiene 03 hijos mayores de edad. En la actualidad vive con una hija y sus nietos. Mavila se dedica a la venta de gaseosas y golosinas, tiene un cochecito  rodante y se instala en la puerta de un hospital donde está ubicado su negocio, las ventas son muy buenas porque es conocida por las personas que acuden al hospital y los transeúntes que siempre buscan bebidas frescas, se siente feliz porque gracias a su trabajo puede apoyar a su hija y a sus nietos, mas adelante desea  terminar su casa y trasladar su negocio allí. Mavila invertirá su préstamo para comprar más bebidas y golosinas, la época de verano es muy buena para su negocio.
Mavila  agradece  a  los Inversionistas de KIVA por su préstamo y el de su grupo comunal.
En la foto es la ultima viste polo rojo y pantalón corto marron.
texts.en:
Mavila is a member of the El Arbolito group. She is 52 years and is a widow with 3 adult children. She currently lives with one of her daughters and her grandchildren. Mavila makes her living selling fizzy drinks and sweets, she has a street cart and works at the entrance to a hospital where her business is based. The sales are very strong because she is known by the people who visit the hospital and the passers-by who are always looking for cool drinks. She feels happy because it is thanks to her work that she can support her daughter and her grandchildren, in the future, she hopes to finish her home and move the business there. 

Mavila will invest this loan to buy more drinks and sweets - the summer season is very profitable for her business. Mavila is grateful to the Kiva loan lenders for this loan and the loan from her communal bank. Mavila is the last person in the photo, dressed in a red T-shirt and short brown trousers.

loans.use: to buy drinks and sweets.

loans.name: Lucas Antonio

texts.es: Don Lucas lleva 25 años de trabajar como jardinero con sus ingresos pudo hacer su casa el cual poco a poco la fue construyendo, su hijo varón trabaja con el ayudándole, la mayoría de sus clientes son dueños de quinta, su esposa por su parte trabaja en un preescolar así ambos se apoyan económicamente, este crédito que solicita es para comprar su propia podadora de motor para facilitar más su trabajo ya que es muy difícil y desgastante laborar solamente con tijera y no puede avanzar mucho, con su propio instrumento tiene mayores posibilidades de encontrar más trabajo, espera en un futuro formar su propio vivero de plantas y grama.
texts.en: Lucas has been working as a gardener for 25 years, and with his income he was able to buy his home, which he built little by little. His eldest son works with him, helping him out; the majority of his customers own country houses. Meanwhile, his wife works in a kindergarten so they both support each other economically. The loan Lucas is seeking is to buy his own motorized lawnmower to ease his work as it is very difficult and time-consuming working alone with only shears and so he can't progress a lot. With his own equipment, he will have more opportunities of finding more work, and in the future, he hopes to set up his own nursery of plants and grass.

loans.use: to buy a motorized lawnmower.

loans.name: Maria Rosana

texts.es:
María es una mujer de 37 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos, María no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Enfermería que deseaba, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta escuchar muisca y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra para compartir con su padres cuando los visita.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, María trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de gelatinas, chupetes y raspadillas, adicionalmente en la temporada de invierno vende deliciosos dulces como mazamorras, colado y otros, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 6 horas, María se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
María se encuentra agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una máquina raspadillera, así como vasos y cucharas descartables, de esta manera María tendrá su negocio mejor acondicionado y podrá atender a mas clientes, así pues María seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para salir adelante y desea lograr su gran sueño de terminar la construcción total de su vivienda.
texts.en:
María is a 37 year old woman who lives in the city of Chincha.  She is a very friendly, hard-working, and enthusiastic person with a strong desire to succeed.  Regrettably, because of a lack of economic resources and the need to work to pay her expenses, María couldn’t study for the professional degree in nursing that she wanted but she would have really liked to have done so. In her free time, she enjoys listening to music and sometimes she cooks a delicious “Carapulcra”* to share with her parents when they visit.

By her own initiative, and with much determination and dedication, María works in her small business selling gelatins, lollipops, and “raspadillas” (snow cones).  In addition, during the winter season, she sells delicious sweets such as maize porridge, “colado” (traditional Peruvian dessert prepared with beans, sugar, cloves, and toasted sesame seeds) and other desserts.  She works every day from early in the morning and can work about six hours.  María feels at ease doing her work and believes that it is going well because of the friendly treatment she provides to her customers.

María is grateful for the Kiva loans because thanks to the help provided, she will be able to buy a “raspadillera” (snow cone machine) as well as disposable cups and spoons.  In this way, María’s business will be better equipped and she will be able to service more customers.  So then, María will continue working and striving to get ahead and achieve her great dream of completing overall construction of her home.

* An ancient dish of Andean origin, carapulcra is a peculiar pork and dry-potato stew, flavored with chocolate, cumin, peanuts, port wine, and coriander.
(http://theperuguide.com/gastronomy/peruvian-cuisine-glossary/carapulcra.html)

loans.use: to purchase a "raspadillera" (snow cone machine), cups, and spoons.

loans.name: Elsa Lucrecia

texts.es:
La Señora Elsa forma parte del banco comunal Mujeres Solidarias hace 3 años, vive por el Cantón Paute lugar que tiene un clima privilegiado ya que es cálido, cuenta con varios lugares para disfrutar de la naturaleza, su gente son muy trabajadora, se dedican a la floricultura, agricultura, crianza de animales y comercio.

La Señora Elsa tiene 36 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 15, 12 y 10 años de edad, sus dos primeros hijos están estudiando en el colegio y su ultimo hijo en una escuela de la localidad. Su esposo labora como jornalero, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en casa de su madre con quien comparte los gastos del hogar.

Doña Elsa se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y como vive en el campo cría cuyes, pollos y en especial ganado del cual vende la leche, también labora en la agricultura y sus cosechas las vende en su cantón.

Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cuyes, pollos y materiales de construcción para la realización de un galpón para la crianza de cuyes. 

Su meta es estudiar gastronomía ya que le gusta cocinar.
texts.en:
Señora Elsa has been part of the communal bank Mujeres Solidarias (United Women) for three years. She lives in the canton of Paute, a place that has a privileged climate, since it is warm, and it has a number of places to enjoy nature. Its people are very hard-working. They work in floriculture, agriculture, raising animals, and business.

Señora Elsa is 36 years old. She is married and has three children, ages 15, 12, and 10. Her oldest two children are in secondary school, and her youngest son attends a local school. Her husband works as a day laborer. They don't have their own home, so they live in the house of her mother, with whom they share the household expenses.

Doña Elsa does her household tasks, and since she lives in the country, she raises guinea pigs, chickens, and especially cattle, whose milk she sells. She also works in agriculture and sells her harvests in her canton.

She will invest her loan in the purchase of guinea pigs, chickens, and construction materials to construct a shed for raising guinea pigs.

Her goal is to study gastronomy, since she likes to cook.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs, chickens, and construction materials

loans.name: María Del Carmen

texts.es:
La Señora María es una socia muy joven que forma parte del banco comunal Mujeres Solidarias hace algún tiempo, es una mujer muy positiva que transmite su positivismo y alegría a todas las socias, le gusta el banco comunal por el compañerismo que existe en el grupo y porque el tiempo del crédito es corto y así les permiten financiar rápido su negocio. Vive por el Cantón Paute lugar que tiene un clima privilegiado ya que es cálido, cuenta con varios lugares para disfrutar de la naturaleza, su gente son muy trabajadoras, se dedican a la floricultura, agricultura, crianza de animales y comercio.

La Señora. María tiene 25 años, es casada y fruto de esa unión ha concebido dos hijos de 7 y 2 años de edad, su primer hijo está estudiando en una escuelita de la localidad. Su esposo labora como empleado privado y la casa en la que vive es de su propia.

Ella se dedicaba hace 9 años a vender hortalizas en el mercado del sector, pero este negocio no es muy rentable y muchas veces tenia perdidas, hace 8 mese se dedica a la venta de carne, vende cerdos enteros pelados y carne de cerdo por libras.

Su crédito anterior lo ha invirtió en la compra de hortalizas, pero su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de carne de cerdo y así continuar creciendo en este nuevo negocio.
texts.en:
María is a very young member who has been part the communal bank Mujeres Solidarias for some time. She is a very positive woman who transmits her positivity and happiness to all of the members. She likes the communal bank because of the comradeship that exists in the group and because the loan time is short and it allows them to quickly finance their businesses. She lives in Cantón Paute, a place that has an exceptional warm climate, it has various places to enjoy nature, its people are very hardworking, and they make a living by growing flowers, agriculture, raising livestock and commerce.

María is 25 years old. She is married and from her relationship she has 2 children ages 7 and 2. Her first son is studying at a school in the area. Her husband works as a private-sector employee and they own the house they live in. 

For 9 years she has made a living selling vegetables in the area market, but that business is not very profitable and many times she had losses. 8 months ago she began selling meat. She sells entire skinned pigs and pork meat by the pound. 

Her last loan was invested in the purchase of vegetables, but her new loan will be invested in the purchase of pork meat so that she can continue to grow her new business.

loans.use: to buy pork.

loans.name: Rosa Margarita

texts.es:
La Señora Rosa ahora es la presidenta del banco comunal Mujeres Solidarias, le gusta mucho estar en el grupo de la banca comunal por el compañerismo y la solidaridad del grupo. Vive por el Cantón Paute lugar que tiene un clima privilegiado ya que es cálido, cuenta con varios lugares para disfrutar de la naturaleza, su gente son muy trabajadoras, se dedican a la floricultura, agricultura, crianza de animales y comercio.

La Señora. Rosa es una mujer que le dedica el mayor tiempo posible a su hogar, tiene 28 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 8 y 6 años de edad que están estudiando en una escuelita de la localidad. Su esposo labora como jornalero y la casa en la que viven es propia.

Ella pasa la mayor parte de su tiempo al cuidado de su hogar y como vive en el campo cría pollos, cuyes y ganado, labora también en la agricultura, estos trabajos le dan la oportunidad de aportar a la economía de su casa ya que es una actividad rentable. 

Su crédito anterior lo invirtió en la compra de pollos de los cuales obtuvo buenas ganancias. Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cuyes para incrementar la crianza de estos animales.
texts.en:
Rosa is now the president of the Mujeres Solidarias communal bank.  She really likes being in the communal bank because of the group's camaraderie and solidarity.  She lives in the Paute canton, an area with a wonderfully mild climate.  In the canton there are various places to enjoy nature.  Its people are very hard-working, and they engage in growing flowers, agriculture, raising animals, and commerce.

Rosa is a woman who spends the most amount of time possible at her home.  She is 28 years old and married.  They have two children, ages eight and six, and the children go to a school in the area.  Her husband works as a day worker, and they live in their own house.

She spends most of her time taking care of her home.  As they live in the country, she raises chickens, guinea pigs, and livestock.  She also farms.  These jobs give her the opportunity to contribute to the household finances because they are profitable.

She used her previous loan to buy chickens, and she got good income from them.  She will use her new loan to buy guinea pigs in order to raise more of these animals.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs.

loans.name: Porfiria

texts.es: La señora   Porfiria tiene 26 años, tiene dos hijos de las edades de 2 y 5 años, ella  se dedica a la confección de sombreros de cholitas,  cuenta que le fue bien con el anterior crédito ya que lo utilizo en la compra de una maquina over,  ahora en esta ocasión solicita el crédito para la compra de tela por mayor para la confección de sombreros ya que aumento su producción y desea abastecer a toda su clientela.
texts.en: Porfiria is 26 years old and she has two children who are two and five years old.  She makes cholita hats for a living.  She tells us that her previous loan worked out well for her as she used it to buy an overlock sewing machine.  This time, she is asking for a loan to buy fabric wholesale to make hats as her production has increased and she wants to supply all of her customers.

loans.use: to buy fabric wholesale

loans.name: Las Triunfadoras De La Ensenada Group

texts.es:
Maritza  es miembro del  grupo Las Triunfadoras de la Ensenada

Maritza tiene 41 años, es soltera y  madre de 01 hija de 17 años. Maritza vive con su padre y su hermana, tanto ella como su hermana son las que sustentan el hogar. Maritza se dedica por las mañanas  a la venta de pescado, tiene un puesto ambulante en  un mercado de la zona donde vive, por las tardes prepara  mazamorras (dulce tradicional) y los vende a sus vecinos y amigos del lugar. Gracias a los ingresos que percibe por su trabajo puede mantener a su familia sobretodo ayudar a su hija con sus estudio, con el tiempo le gustaría tener su propio puesto en algún mercado para continuar con su negocio, el préstamo solicitado le servirá para seguir incrementando su negocio con la compra de pescado y mariscos al por mayor. De otro lado esta agradecida por quienes hacen posible su préstamo a EDAPROSPO y a los Inversionistas de KIVA.
En la foto viste polo rojo y jean color azul.
texts.en:
Maritza is a member of the "Las Triunfadoras de la Ensenada" group.

Maritza is 41 years old, single, and the mother of 17-year-old daughter. Maritza lives with her father and her sister, and both she and her sister support the household. 

In the mornings, Maria sells fish. She sells as a street vendor in the local market. In the afternoon she prepares mazamorras (a traditional sweet) and sells them to her neighbors and friends.

Thanks to the income she earns for her work, she is able to support her family, and above all help her daughter with her education. In time she would like to have her own stall in some market, so that she can continue with her business.

The loan she has applied for will help her to keep increasing her business through the purchase of fish and other seafood at wholesale. Moreover, she is thankful to those who make possible her loan from EDAPROSPO, and to the Kiva investors.

In the photo she is wearing a red T-shirt and blue jeans.

loans.use: To buy fish and other seafood.

loans.name: Luchando Por Un Sueño Group

texts.es: El grupo “Luchando Por Un Sueño” está conformado por 07 socios, siendo Angélica la tesorera del grupo, cargo que ha llevado con responsabilidad. Angélica es casada y tiene 06 independientes. A sus 63 años Angélica a llegado cumplir algunas de sus metas como mejorar su vivienda y mantener su negocio. Hace más de 40 años que cuenta con un negocio de renovadora de calzados, la cual trabaja juntamente con su esposo, en un mercado de su localidad. Su mayor deseo es de instalar una bodega en su vivienda, y de esta manera asegurar su vejez. Con su último crédito comprará materiales para su negocio como carnaza, suelas, pegamentos y plantillas. El grupo agradece el apoyo brindado ya que hace posible su progreso. Angélica es la primera del lado derecho y viste una casaca color azul.
texts.en:
The “Luchando Por Un Sueño” group is made up of seven members, and Angelica is the group's treasurer, a position she has carried out responsibly.

Angélica is married and has six dependents. At 63, Angelica has succeeded in fulfilling some of her goals, such as improving her home and keeping her business going. She has had a shoe repair business for more than 40 years, where she works alongside her husband in a local market. 

Her greatest wish is to set up a small store in her home and in this way secure her old age. With her latest loan, she will buy materials for her business, such as leather, shoe soles, glues and insoles.

The group is grateful for the support provided, as it makes their progress possible. Angelica is the first one on the right side, and is wearing a blue jacket.

loans.use: To buy leather, shoe soles, glues and insoles.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pepper seed and farming supplies

loans.name: Ilsem Veronica

texts.es: La Sra.  Islem tiene 28 años, ella se dedica a la venta de variedad de artículos de primera necesidad como abarrotes, dulces, refrescos y variedad de artículos en su tienda surtida,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, La Sra.  Islem va a usar este préstamo para la compra variedad de abarrotes para surtir su negocio como arroz, fideo, harina, refrescos,  galletas y azúcar por mayor para surtir su tienda   y  de esta manera brindar variedad de productos a sus clientes,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir mejorando en su  negocio, La Sra.  Islem va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando productos y así mejorando sus ingresos, su deseo para su negocio es tener un almacén y así brindar un  mejor servicio a su clientela. La Sra.  Islem es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en: Islem is 28 years old. She sells a variety of basic need products like groceries, sweets and soft drinks. This loan is her first within the institution.  Islem is going to use the loan to purchase a variety of groceries in order to stock her business like rice, noodles, soft drinks, cookies and sugar in wholesale amounts. These will stock her store and provide a variety of products to her customers. Her reason for requesting the loan is to continue improving her business. Islem is going to use the benefits to continue purchasing products and thus improving her income. Her wish for her business is to have a grocery store and to offer a better service to her clientele. Islem is a very hardworking person and she is happy about the offered opportunities.

loans.use: purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Liliana Angelita

texts.es:
La Señora. Liliana conforma el banco comunal Yanuncay hace 3 años, este banco comunal se encuentra conformado por amigas y familiares, que tienen un mismo propósito que es salir adelante con sus familias. Vive por el sector de Yanuncay en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad tiene una gran riqueza natural y arquitectónica que enamora a quienes la visitan, su gran variedad gastronómica cautiva el paladar de propios y extraños.

La Señora Liliana tiene 36 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 17, 10 y 6 años de edad, su primer hijo estudia en el colegio y sus dos hijos  menores están en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo es chofer y labora conduciendo un taxi, la casa en la que vive es propia.
 
Doña Liliana desde hace 2 años se dedica a la preparación y venta de viandas, labora de lunes a viernes sin un horario fijo, este trabajo le da la oportunidad de aportar a la economía de su casa y cuidar de sus hijos. 

Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de víveres y también repuestos para el taxi de su esposo. 

Su meta es agrandar su negocio.
texts.en:
Liliana has been part of the Yanuncay communal bank for 3 years, this communal bank in made up of friends and family members who have the same aim: getting them and their families ahead in life. Liliana lives in the Yanuncay sector of the city of Cuenca, this city has is naturally and architecturally rich which delights those who visit it. Its gastronomic variety excites the palates of locals and foreigners alike.

Liliana is 36 years old, she is married, and as fruit of her marriage, she has 3 children aged 6, 10 and 17. Her eldest son studies in secondary school and her two younger children are at a school in the city. Her husband is a taxi driver, and they own the house in which they live.
 
For the last two years, Liliana has been making her living preparing and selling food, she works from Monday to Friday without a fixed working schedule. This job gives her the opportunity to contribute to the family's income and care for her children.  

Liliana will invest this loan in buying supplies as well as spare parts for her husband's taxi. Her aim is to expand the business.

loans.use: to buy provisions and spare parts for the car.

loans.name: María Angelita

texts.es:
La Señora María es socia fundadora del banco comunal Yanuncay, grupo que le gusta por el compañerismo y la unión del grupo. Vive por el sector de Yanuncay en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad que tiene una gran riqueza natural y arquitectónica que enamora a quienes la visitan, su gran variedad gastronómica cautiva el paladar de propios y extraños.

Doña María tiene de 77 años de edad, es viuda y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 7 hijo quienes todos son mayores de edad, profesionales, están casados y viven independientes. La casa en la que viven es propia.
 
La Señora María desde muy joven se dedica a la venta de comida, este negocio lo aprendió de su madre, labora de domingo a domingo sin un horario fijo.
 
Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de víveres para la elaboración de sus platos y también en la compra de una nueva vajilla. 

Su sueño es continuar creciendo en su negocio.
texts.en: María is the founding member of the Yanuncay Communal Bank, a group she enjoys because of its camaraderie and unity.  She lives in the Yanuncay sector of Cuenca, a city that has an abundance of natural resources and architecture that enamors its visitors.  Its gastronomic variety captivates the palates of locals and foreigners. María is 77 years old.  She is a widow with seven children who are all adults, professionals, married, and living on their own.  She owns the house in which she lives.  María has been engaged in food sales since she was very young.  She learned this business from her mother.  She works from Sunday to Sunday without a set schedule.  She will use the loan to purchase food for the preparation of her dishes and she will also buy new tableware.  Her dream is to continue growing her business.

loans.use: to purchase food and tableware.

loans.name: Janeth Jakeline

texts.es:
La Señora. Janeth es una socia fundadora del banco comunal Yanuncay siempre mantiene su alegría y carisma. Vive por el sector de Yanuncay en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad que tiene una gran riqueza natural y arquitectónica que enamora a quienes la visitan, su gran variedad gastronómica cautiva el paladar de propios y extraños.

La Señora. Janeth tiene 42 años de edad, es soltera y vive con su padre con quien comparte los gastos de su hogar y le hace compañía, la casa es de su padre.

Doña Janeth trabaja en el negocio de su tía como ayudante de cocina, labora de domingo a domingo desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 4 de la tarde.

Su crédito lo va a invertir en materiales de construcción para arreglar la casa de su padre ya que por el tiempo se ha deteriorado y también lo va a comprar medicinas para  mejorar su salud. 

Su meta es construir su casa propia.
texts.en:
Janeth is a founding member of Yanuncay Communal Bank.  She always stays happy and charismatic.  She lives in the Yanuncay neighborhood of the city of Cuenca.  This city has great natural and architectural riches that fascinate visitors.  Its great culinary variety attracts the palate of both residents and visitors.

Janeth, 42, is single and lives with her father.  She shares the household expenses with him and keeps him company.  The house belongs to her father.

Janeth works in her aunt's business as a kitchen helper.  She works from Sunday to Sunday from 8 in the morning until 4 in the afternoon.

She's going to invest her loan in construction materials to fix up her father's house because it has deteriorated over time.  She's also going to buy medicine to improve her health.

Her goal is to build her own house.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and medicine

loans.name: Las Profes  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Las Profes se encuentra conformado por 7 socias y 1 socio quienes en su mayoría se dedican a laborar en la docencia pero para mejorar su estabilidad económica trabajan en diferentes actividades económicas como el comercio, todas las socias del grupo son mujeres que tienen un gran carisma, son alegres ya que siempre están buscando un buen motivo para sonreír. Viven en diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es una mezcla de la arquitectura moderna y la colonial, es desde Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, su gente aun mantiene la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos. 

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. María Alexandra, se encuentra realizando su cuarto crédito con sus amigas y compañeras que conforman el banco comunal Las Profes, vive por el sector de Totoracocha en la ciudad de Cuenca, es una mujer amable y muy alegre.

La Señora María Alexandra tiene 27 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido un hijo de 8 años de edad que esta estudiando en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo es un profesional ya que es diseñador grafico, no tienen casa propia por lo que vive en casa de un familiar.

Ella es una mujer luchadora y emprendedora ya que labora en varias actividades, una de ellas es la venta pijamas desde hace 10 años, trabaja en la imprenta que tiene su esposo y es una profesional en la docencia la cual se encuentra ejerciendo desde hace 3 años. 

Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pijamas para continuar creciendo en su negocio. 

Su sueño es tener una propia escuela.
texts.en:
The “Las Profes” communal bank is made up of seven ladies and one gentleman who are mostly teachers but also work in different businesses.  All of the group’s members have great charisma, are happy and are always looking for a reason to smile.  They live in parts of Cuenca, a city of modern and colonial agriculture, and a World Heritage site since December of 1999.  Its people maintain their cultures and traditions. 

María Alexandra is one of the members receiving her fourth loan with her friends and colleagues in the communal bank.  She lives in the Totoracocha neighborhood of Cuenca and she is a very happy friendly lady.

María Alexandra is 27 years old, married and has an eight year old son who attends school in the city.  Her husband is a professional graphic designer.  They don’t have a home of their own, but live with a relative.

She is a hardworking and enterprising woman who works in various activities, one of which is selling pajamas.  She’s been doing this for 10 years.  She also works in the print shop with her husband and has been a professional teacher for three years.

She will use the money from this loan to buy pajamas to continue her business.

Her dream is to have her own school.

loans.use: to buy pajamas for her business.

loans.name: Diana Cecilia

texts.es:
Diana es una mujer de 30 años, vive en la ciudad de Huaraz con su esposo y su pequeño hijo, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta que junto con su esposo dedican todos sus esfuerzos por salir adelante, gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Diana pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Derecho, lamentablemente no pudo culminar sus estudios, en sus ratos libres le gusta escuchar música y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Ceviche para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Diana trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta y alquiler de vestidos y ternos, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, Diana se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por el trato amable y buenos precios que brinda a sus clientes.
Diana se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mayor cantidad de vestidos y ternos para abastecer su negocio, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para salir adelante y lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Diana is 30 years old and lives with her husband and young son in the city of Huaraz.  She loves them very much and they are her reason for living.  She is a very friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic person who, along with her husband, dedicates all of her efforts to getting ahead.  Thanks to her efforts and support from her parents, Diana was able to study to become a lawyer.  Unfortunately she was not able to complete her studies.  She likes to listen to music and sometimes prepares a delicious Ceviche to share with her family in her spare time.

On her own initiative and with much effort and dedication, Diana works in her small business where she sells and rents dresses and suits.  She works every day from early morning and can work about 10 yours.  Diana is comfortable doing this and believes that things are going well for her because of the friendly service and good prices she gives to her customers.

Diana is very grateful to the Kiva lenders and thanks to their help she will be able to buy dresses and suits to stock her business.  In this way she can continue to work to get ahead and achieve her greatest dream of having a home of her own.

loans.use: to buy dresses and suits.

loans.name: Ruddy Aracely

texts.es:
Ruddy es una mujer de 24 años, vive en la ciudad de Huaraz con su pequeño hijo de tres años, a quien ama y es su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su pequeño; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Ruddy no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta seguir trabajando y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Ruddy trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 12 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y por el trato amable que brinda a sus cliente.
Ruddy se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, tales como arroz, azúcar, leche, menestras, bebidas y otros, de esta manera tendrá mejor abastecido su negocio y podrá atender a mas clientes, así pues Ruddy seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ampliar su negocio y tener su propio mini market.
texts.en:
Ruddy is 24 years old and lives in Huaraz with her three year old son, whom she loves very much and is her main reason for living.  She is a friendly, hardworking, enthusiastic woman who puts forth all of her efforts to getting her son ahead.  Unfortunately she was not able to study for a professional career due to a lack of resources, but she would have liked to do so.  She likes to work in her spare time and sometimes prepares a delicious chicken and rice dish to share with her family.

On her own initiative, and with much dedication, Ruddy works her small business selling groceries.  She works daily from early morning for about 12 hours.  She believes that things are going well for her because of the good prices and friendly service she gives her customers.

Ruddy is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, because thanks to them she will be able to buy merchandise such as rice, sugar, milk, vegetables, drinks, and other things.  In this way she will be able to stock her store and serve more customers.  Ruddy will be able to continue working and making an effort to achieve her greatest dream of having her own mini market.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Raul

texts.es:
Raúl es un hombre de 26 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Chincha, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos, no ha podido estudiar la carrera profesional de Medicina Humana, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Raúl trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de tubérculos, el cuenta con un puesto de ventas en un mercadillo donde realiza sus ventas, Raúl trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Raúl se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mayor cantidad de tubérculos, como papa, camote, yuca y otros, de esta manera Raúl tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido y podrá atender a mas clientes, así pues Raúl seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para salir adelante y lograr su gran sueño de convertirse en un gran mayorista.
texts.en:
Raúl is 26-year-old gentleman who is single and lives in the city of Chincha. He is a friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic person who has the desire to succeed. Unfortunately, due to the lack of financial resources and the need to work in order cover his expenses, Raúl was not able to study for a professional degree in medicine as he would have liked. In his free time, he enjoys playing soccer with his friends. On a few occasions, Raúl prepares a delicious dish of “carapulcra con sopa seca” (a spicy Peruvian stew served with dried potatoes) to share with his family.

Through his own initiative and with great effort and dedication, Raúl has worked in his own small business of selling tubers. He has a vending stall at the market where he conducts his sales. Every day he begins his job in the early morning hours and is able to work approximately 10 hours. Raúl enjoys his work and believes he is doing well because he offers good prices and friendly service to his customers.

He is very grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to the assistance they have provided, he will be able to buy a large quantity of tubers such as potatoes, sweet potatoes, cassava, and other items. As a result, Raúl will have a well-stocked business and be able to serve more customers. He continues to work and strive to get ahead so that he can achieve his greatest dream of becoming a major wholesaler.

loans.use: to buy tubers.

loans.name: Pov's Group

texts.en: 58-year-old Pov is married and a mother of eight children, one of whom is still dependent on her. Pov and her family reside in a rural village of the Moung Russey district in Cambodia’s Battambang province. She farms rice and plants sesame to support her family. Pov earns approximately 22,000 KHR per day. She has been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) for one loan cycle already, which allowed her to improve her family’s livelihood. Pov is now in need of money to support her business by buying fertilizer. She is leading a female group member who has also been with VisionFund for one loan cycle already to apply for a loan of 1,200,000 KHR each. Pov is an industrious woman who hopes to earn more income for her family.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer

loans.name: Theouy

texts.en: Theouy, 55 years old, lives in a rural area of the Moung Russey district in Cambodia. She is a widow and a mother of three children. She earns her living through farming rice on a two-hectare plot, earning around 29,000 KHR daily. This will be Theouy’s sixth time requesting a loan via Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. The previous loans have enabled her to meet her family’s needs. Theouy is now in need of money to buy fertilizer to help keep her rice-growing business in good shape. Thus, she is now seeking a 2,500,000 KHR loan with VisionFund. After receiving and using the requested loan as planned, Theouy believes that her rice field will provide her with good quality crops so that she can sell the rice for a good price, generating more profit for the family.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer

loans.name: Sokheng

texts.en: Sokheng, 40, is a citizen in a rural area of Kandal Stoeng district in Cambodia. She is married and blessed with five children, three (a daughter and two sons) of whom are dependent on her and currently in school. Sokheng makes her living through farming rice. Sokheng has been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) for two loan cycles already. The past loans have had a huge positive impact on her as well as her family. Sokheng was able to purchase a plot of farm to run her rice-growing business, which provides the source of her family’s income. She is now seeking for a USD 1,000 loan to help her daughter celebrate her marriage. After receiving and using the loan as she intends, Sokheng believes that she will be able to successfully help her daughter get married.

loans.use: To help her daughter celebrate her marriage

loans.name: Sophat

texts.en:
A 45-year-old man named Sophat lives in Kandal province’s Kandal Stoeng district in Cambodia. He is married and blessed with four children, one of whom is still under his responsibility. Sophat and his wife earn a living through farming rice. To add more income to the family, Sophat also works as a construction worker. He is a second-time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). The first loan that he obtained and successfully paid back has enabled him to improve his standard of living and better meet the family’s needs. 

He is now seeking a USD 1,000 loan to run a new business, which is a pig-raising business, by purchasing piglets to raise. Sophat will also utilize his requested loan to dig a well in order to sufficiently supply water to his rice field. After receiving and wisely using the loan, Sophat hopes to grow healthy and fruitful rice crop yields as well as raise fat and healthy pigs.

loans.use: to purchase piglets to raise.

loans.name: Lon

texts.en: Lon, 55 years old, resides in the Kandal Stoeng district in Cambodia. He is married and has nine children, two of whom are still under his responsibility and currently in school. To make a living, Lon and his wife have a business farming rice, the business in which they have been involved for more than 20 years. This will be Lon’s second time requesting a loan from VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). The past loan enabled him to send his children to school, which makes him very satisfied. Lon is now applying for a new loan with VisionFund of 1,000 USD to purchase a decent motor for his children. After receiving and wisely using the loan, Lon hopes that he will be able to help make the transportation of his beloved children easier.

loans.use: To purchase a decent motor

loans.name: Yeang's Group

texts.en:
Yeang, 44, is married and lives in a rural area of Dambae district. She has three children, one of whom is dependent on her and still in school. Presently, she grows rice, cassava and beans; she has been in this business for 24 years. The current business earns her about 22,000KHR and she manages to save about 10,000KHR each day, after daily expenses. 

Yeang has been with VisionFund for two cycles, while the other member just joined VisionFund this cycle. Yeang completely paid back the previous loans, which helped relieve her family’s burden and improve their livelihood. 

Now she is leading her group of two to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizer for her farmland. 

She hopes this loan will enable her to earn more income from her current business so as to make a better living, and keep her child in school.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her farmland.

loans.name: Samoern's Group

texts.en:
Samoern is a 50-year-old married mother of nine children, two of whom are dependent on her and still in school. Her family lives in a rural area of the Kampong Cham province’s Dambae district of Cambodia.  To support her family, Samoern and her husband work for others, for a fee, with rubber trees. Having been in this business for 25 years, she earns around 25,000KHR per day to meet the family’s needs. 

Samoern’s group consists of five members who have been with VisionFund for one cycle. Samoern fully repaid back the prior loan, which has helped her better support her children’s education. 

Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy rice to feed her family sufficiently. 

She hopes this loan will enable her to improve her standard of living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: To buy rice to feed her family sufficiently.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Samoen's Group

texts.en:
Samoen, 38, is the married mother of one son who is still in school. Rice farming has been Samoen's main income source for several years, supplemented by working for others for a fee. Samoen currently earns about 11,000 riels (KHR) per day and manages to save about 4,000 KHR each day after daily expenses.

Samoen’s group consists of two members who live in a village of the Ou Reang Ov District of Kampong Cham Province. Samoen is taking out her first microloan with VisionFund. She is leading her group in applying for a loan. She is going to use her portion to rent a harvest machine for harvesting her rice and will spend a portion of it on household supplies. She hopes to earn more income from her paddy field so as to make a better living and keep her son in school.

loans.use: To buy household supplies

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ou Reang Ov district

loans.name: Koern's Group

texts.en:
Originally from the Kror Kor district of Cambodia, Koern is 43 years old and married. She has five children, two of whom are dependent on her and still in school. To deal with the financial hardship, she grows rice, and sometimes works for others for a fee to better support the family. Koern's current income is 15,000 KHR per day. 

This is the second loan for Koern with Kiva Field Partner, VisionFund. The previous loan has helped Koern to better support her family with sufficient food. Now she is leading her group of two to request a loan. As the leader, Koern will use her portion to buy fertilizer and pesticides for her farmland.

Koern hopes to increase her crop yield, so she can improve her standard of living, and keep her children in school.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and pesticides for her farmland.

loans.name: Da's Group

texts.en:
Originally from Siem Reap Province’s Srey Snom district, Da is married and 43 years old. She has four children, all of whom are dependent on her and still in school. Da farms rice and raises pigs. Having been in this business for five years, she is able to earn up to KHR 21,000 per day. 

In this group of four (Da's Group), Da is the leader. She is a third-time borrower who has completely repaid her past loans with success. The loans have lessened her family’s burden and gradually improved their livelihood. Da is now leading her group of four to ask for a loan. She will use her portion to buy more piglets for raising. She hopes to fatten her pigs so as to make a living better and keep her children in school.

loans.use: To buy more piglets for raising

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Srey Snom district

loans.name: Savert's Group

texts.en:
